definition: to be enamored of/to have tender feelings for/to be sentimentally attached to (a person or place)
to feel attached to/to long for/to love

sentences.english: I am my beloved's, and his desire is toward me.
sentences.chinese: 我属我的良人，他也恋慕我。

sentences.english: Bending a beautiful head, worshipping not lying.
sentences.chinese: 低垂着美丽的头，恋慕而不敢同躺。

sentences.english: Mary; he would go through fire and water for her.
sentences.chinese: 吉姆恋慕玛丽，愿为她赴汤蹈火。

sentences.english: He was a clever and great man. Most of the Chinese love him.
sentences.chinese: 他是个聪明而巨大的人，大多数的神州人都很恋慕他。

sentences.english: Lust not after her beauty in thine heart; neither let her take thee with her eyelids.
sentences.chinese: 你心中不要恋慕他的美色，也不要被他眼皮勾引。

definition: in love with/to feel deeply attached to
to cherish the memory of sb/to think of with respect
to be jealous of (sb's achievements etc)/to be envious/envy
to admire/to hold in high esteem
